sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Action) While wielding a lightsaber, the character may take the Defensive Circle action, making a Hard (3 purple d8) Lightsaber (Intellect) check. If successful, the character plus one ally per success within short range gains ranged and melee defense X until the beginning of the character's next turn. X equals 1, plus 1 for every advantage rolled.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <name>Defensive circle</name> <number>TAL0001026</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 22:08:11</sys_created_on> <sys_id>6021df60dbea0c542901de90cf96190c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 22:08:11</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
